p: Significant differences in viral titre were measured in whole-body samples at 4 and 14 dpi (ANOVA, Tukey HSD post-hoc test, P < .001). At 14 dpi, a significantly higher viral load was measured in AEG populations relative to ALB LI populations (ANOVA, Tukey HSD post-hoc test, P < .001) ( Figure 4). No significant effect of population or temperature on viral load was measured.
